name: Thorir the Blacksmith
dialogues: Do you need a weapon or armor?
I can repair your equipment for a fair price.

name: Elena the Healer
dialogues: Greetings, traveler. How can I help?
I can heal your wounds and restore your vitality.
Be careful out there. The woods are dangerous.

name: Geralt the Innkeeper
dialogues: We have the best ale in the region.
Feel free to rest in one of our rooms.
